title: Personnel File Request with Incident Reports

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting any and all known records, of employee JAMES CARY JACKSON (#3302) (including potentially associated names Cary Jackson, CJACKSON, Karo Jackson, Cary J. Jackson), hire date 7/7/2003, from the Griffin Police Department, including: 

1) All available employment records, any disciplinary records, complaints, reprimands, and internal affairs investigative files. 
2) This request includes any records that list him as a witness, suspect, victim, complainant, person of interest or informant. 
3) Any contact cards, mug shots, or any other electronic or tangible document as it relates to the above referenced individual.
4) Copies of ‘Performance Evaluations for Employees’ since being hired (if overly burdensome, the last 5 years are suitable for now). 
5) Copies of all Incident/Investigation Reports where he is listed as a Victim, Others Involved, Witness, or Reporting Officer (if overly burdensome, the last 5 years are suitable for now). 
6) Copies of Time Cards from January 1, 2023 through June 30, 2023. (Usually from ActiveReports 9, Data Dynamics, now part of Mescius).
7) Copies of GPS location data (if available) from Griffin Police Department-assigned vehicle from January 1, 2023 through June 30, 2023.
8) If cellular phones or other similar communication devices are available or provided to Griffin Police Department employees, a copy of all associated phone records from January 1, 2023 through June 30, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Improving Transparency Mx. Moniker
